00040 #ifndef _BOOT_H_
00041 #define _BOOT_H_
00042 
00043 #include <inttypes.h>
00044 
00046 typedef struct control_block
00047 {
00048    /*WARNING: struct must have even size (word aligned)*/
00050    uint16_t node_id;
00052    uint32_t start_addr;
00054    uint32_t byte_count;
00056    uint8_t reprogram;
00057    uint8_t reserved;
00058 } boot_control_block_t;
00059 
00060 /*control block address is in the on-chip eeprom, address 0-12 */
00062 #define CONTROL_BLOCK_ADDR 0
00063 #define CONTROL_BLOCK_SIZE sizeof (boot_control_block_t)
00064 
00065 #define MAX_PAGES 248
00066 
00067 #define RESET_VECTOR_ADDR 0x1E000 
00068 
00069 void flash_write_page(void *flash_addr, uint8_t *buf);
00070 uint8_t flash_read_fuse (void *addr);
00071 void flash_enable_rww (void);
00072 uint16_t flash_read_word (void *addr);
00073 
00074 #endif /*_BOOT_H_*/
